name: Wallet API
body:
### Obtaining a token
Sign-in to [Wallet web app](http://walletapp.net), go to User profile and Auth token section.

### Authorization
Every API call must contain url param *auth*

Example
```
GET /api/v1/users?auth=b5agekVlZhN64FHocc2ozdClGRDnXmDy
```

Auth token can be obtained in profile settings.

### Users
Retrieves users
```
GET /api/v1/users
```

### Accounts
Retrieves all accounts
``` 
GET /api/v1/user/:user_id/accounts
```

### Categories
Retrieves all users categories
```
GET /api/v1/user/:user_id/categories
```

### Currencies
Retrieves all user's currencies
```
GET /api/v1/user/:user_id/currencies
```

### Records
Retrieves all records in particular account
```
GET /api/v1/user/:user/account/:account/records
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
